value: This document defines the handling procedure for Card Early Renewal , which is handled by CCC - HK Teleservices Team.
This procedure applies to Card Early Renewal Request and is applicable to all credit card s , Revolving Personal Loan (RPL) and Revolving Cash Cards (RCC).

CCE/SCCE: Client Care Executive / Senior Client Care Executive 
TM/MGR: Team Manager / Manager, Client Care Centre  
PCS: Specialist/ Senior Specialist  Process Control
Spec/SSpec: Specialist/ Senior Specialist  Service Operations
CI: Unsecured Lending, Credit Initiation
SR: Service Request

Voice recording

 Permanent

R elated documents 

7 years
The cut off time of Early Renewal Request is from Monday to Friday 16:00.

For client instruction received before the cut off time, the request will be processed within 4 working days.

 For client instruction received after the cut off time, the request will be processed within 5 working days.

Global Process Standards: Voice and Virtual V4.1 (or any future update version) 

Retail Banking Client Authentication Global Process Standards V4.0 (or any future update version) 

Authentication Guidelines for Client Care Centre, HK Version 1.1 (or any future update version)
